notes: Game runs pretty smooth only a few frame drops, but the title screen is not working, neither are any cutscenes. I don't know what I could tweak to make it works perfectly.
title: SOULCALIBUR VI

notes: Tested in training and story modes. Performance is great. As reported elsewhere, there is no network connectivity and fmv doesn't play.
title: SOULCALIBUR VI

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.14-041814-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
Videos cause the game to hang, so Soul Chronicle (main characters story) single player mode does not work. No network connection, so online multiplayer also does not work.
Everything else (character creation, Libra of Soul, battle) works as expected and runs flawlessly.
title: SOULCALIBUR VI

notes: Performance is good. As stated by others, game claims it cannot detect network (anti-cheat bug?), so you can only play arcade, campaign, and local vs at this time.
title: SOULCALIBUR VI

gpu: ATI Technologies Inc. AMD Radeon R9 200 Series
notes:
FMV does not work. 2D Cut-scenes and UI elements work fine. Yellow filter over everything that is rendered in game. Performance is fine minus some stutter problems. tried Esync disable and Wind d3d11. Wine d3d fixes the graphics issues however player models are dark and sometimes ghost in character select. Performance on Wine d3d is Horrible do not recommend at all.

Did not test story or libre of souls. Arcade seems to work fine have not gone further than stage 2.
title: SOULCALIBUR VI
